text: Devpack is a cloud platform as a service (PaaS) developed by KT DS. It supports several programming languages and services as well as integrated DevOps to build, run, deploy and manage applications on the cloud. Devpack is based on Cloud Foundry open technology and runs on a KT ucloud biz infrastructure. Devpack supports several programming languages including Java, Node.js, PHP, Python. == See also == * Cloud Foundry == References == Category:Cloud platforms
title: Devpack
